definition: to ally/to unite/to join/(poetry) antithetical couplet
100 ml/one-tenth of a peck/measure for dry grain equal to one-tenth of sheng 升 or liter, or one-hundredth dou 斗
to close/to join/to fit/to be equal to/whole/together/round (in battle)/conjunction (astronomy)/1st note of pentatonic scale/old variant of 盒[he2]
king or monarch/best or strongest of its type/grand/great

pinyin: Da4 ying1 Lian2 he2 Wang2 guo2

sentences.english: The "UK" is made up of four countries .
sentences.chinese: 聯合王國是由四部分組成的。

sentences.english: In the U. K. a kind of conscription was long in force.
sentences.chinese: 在聯合王國，一種徵兵制長期有效。

sentences.english: Close relatives of the monarch of the United Kingdom are known by the appellation The Royal Family.
sentences.chinese: 近親國王聯合王國所知的稱謂王室。

sentences.english: There is no single legal system in the United Kingdom.
sentences.chinese: 聯合王國不實行完全統一的法律制度。

sentences.english: The United Kingdom consists of Great Britain and Northern Island.
sentences.chinese: 聯合王國是由大不列顛及北愛爾蘭組成。

sentences.english: A division of the United Kingdom in the northeast section of the island of Ireland.
sentences.chinese: 愛爾蘭島東北部分，與聯合王國分離。

sentences.english: The UK is made up of four countries.
sentences.chinese: 聯合王國由四個國家組成。

sentences.english: The United Kingdom consists of Great Britain and the Northern Ireland.
sentences.chinese: 聯合王國是由大不列顛和北愛爾蘭所組成。

sentences.english: The great kingdom consists of Great Britain and Northern Ireland.
sentences.chinese: 聯合王國有不列顛和北愛爾蘭組成。

sentences.english: The United Kingdom includes Northern Ireland and Wales.
sentences.chinese: 聯合王國也包括北愛爾蘭和威爾士。

sentences.english: The coronation of King George I of Great Britain and Ireland took place.
sentences.chinese: 大不列顛和愛爾蘭聯合王國國王喬治一世加冕。

sentences.english: A bloodless revolution in the distribution of wealth is taking place in the U. K.
sentences.chinese: 在聯合王國正發生一場財富分配方面的平穩變革。

sentences.english: London is the capital and the largest city of both England and the United Kingdom.
sentences.chinese: 倫敦爲英格蘭和聯合王國的首都及最大城市。
